DataElement.preferredName: Participant Electronic Form Completion Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator related to the participant completing forms electronically for eligibility

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Electronic Form Completion Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._Someone who takes part in an activity._A questionnaire or measure that is administered on an electronic device, such as a computer, tablet, or smartphone._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Property.preferredName: Electronic Form Complete Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire or measure that is administered on an electronic device, such as a computer, tablet, or smartphone.:To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire or measure that is administered on an electronic device, such as a computer, tablet, or smartphone.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Willing to complete study assessments after the designated clinic visit either 1) remotely (via telephone or videoconference using smartphone, tablet, or computer) or 2) at the clinic on a clinic tablet or computer.
